name: Magma Chamber (itch)
description:
Magma chamber is a puzzle based action game about a slime escaping a labyrinth of a lab inside of a volcano.

Each level has three objectives: Clear each tile, collect the children of slime, and get to the exit.
One wrong move and you could end your chances of clearing each tile or even worse- death.

Each zone has a unique boss fight that will require solving puzzles to defeat them.

Buying the game now will get you a steam key when the game is greenlit, you should only buy the game to help fund development at this moment. The game will launch at 5$ on steam, 2$ in early access. Buying the game now will help support me and allow me to create content much faster and finish my game.
